bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition brought forth by a loss and depletion of liver blood. Ming yi za zhu 明醫雜著 4: 前症若因 腎虛陰火而肝燥者，宜用六味地黃丸，生腎水，滋肝血 , “If the conditions described above are associated with liver dryness brought forth by kidney depletion and yin fire, it is advisable to use the pills with the six ingredients including di huang to generate kidney water which in turn will provide moisture to the liver blood”.
